QuestData.Title: The Admiral Won't Back Down
QuestData.Description: What? You want to stay here to fight? Typical $c, wanting to stay and fight off the Horde while there's still a chance to run for it.$B$BLook, if you really want to save Northwatch, you should report to Admiral Aubrey in the tower behind me. He's keeping his ships here to fight, instead of ferrying us all away like I begged him to.$B$BNow if you'll excuse me, I've got to finish packing!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Admiral Aubrey at Northwatch Hold in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Report to Admiral Aubrey at Northwatch Hold in Southern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: You've ventured all the way here from Honor's Stand? Excellent, we could use your experience here.$B$BThey may have breached the walls, but Northwatch isn't going down without a fight.
